name: Tumblr - Game of Thrones Sigil buttons
description: Replaces your home, inbox, help, settings, and logout buttons with the Stark, Tyrell, Greyjoy, Targaryen, and Tully sigils from Game of Thrones.

user.name: GeekintheJeep
user.about:
A 24-year old geek who happens to have inadvertently stumbled into this Tumblr editing stuff.

Contact me here or on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions or requests!

additional_info: Contact me on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions/problems/requests. Edited 08/22/15: Updated to work with the new Tumblr update. Please note that the Targaryen sigil will only appear if you have XKit enabled.
